alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 4:39AM CST until January 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Hidalgo County in New Mexico and the Rio Grande Valley in southern El Paso County and most of southern Hudspeth County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will be possible, especially near the Playa.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
